lifespan.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the average length of time that someone will live or that something will continue to work
lifespan.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Men have a shorter lifespan than women.
A TV set has an average lifespan of 11 years.
a lifespan of 5 days/10 years etc
lifespan.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the period of time during which something will continue to be useful
lifespan.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The new water distribution system could save hundreds of millions of pounds over its 150-yearlifespan.
